His major challenges are financial ones, so he is working hard and intends to apply for more loans to overcome his difficulties and achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing (shoes and shirts for adults) to bolster his business.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es:
La socia Haydee pertenece al banco comunal SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE.
La socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de crianza de animales menores y al negocio de kiosco escolar, la socia lleva buen  tiempo dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable, la socia continua criando a sus animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan animales, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar animalitos y comida para los mismos.
texts.en:
Haydee belongs to the “San Martin de Zurite” communal bank.

She continues to make a living by raising small animals and running the school kiosk. She has had this business for a while and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day. She is a responsible person. She continues to raise her small animals and then sell them to her clients. She wants to be able to continue working so she can continue supporting her family.

Haydee is requesting the loan to buy small animals and animal feed.

loans.use: to buy small animals and animal feed

loans.name: Elisa

texts.pt:
A senhora Elisa de 38 anos de idade, trabalhadora afecta na educação, solteira mãe de 3 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam o ensino primário e 1 frequenta o ensino secundário, vive na casa própria.
Com o dinheiro do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento, ferros, portas, chapas de cobertura para dar continuidade da sua obra.
A cliente tem como sonho concluir  sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família e construir mais dependências arrendar e  formar-se em gestão de educação.
Tem como desafio os financeiros e tem estado a trabalhar para superá-los, faz xitiques e pretende tomar mais vezeso crédito para  suprí-los e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Elisa is 38 years old. She works in education and is the single mother of three children, two of whom are in elementary school and one of whom is in high school. She lives in his own home.
She will use this loan to buy cement, iron bars, doors, and sheet metal to continue the construction on her house.
The client's dream is to finish the house to provide a better home to her family. She also wants to build more rooms to rent out and study education administration.
Her biggest challenges are financial ones, and she has been working to overcome them. She is part of a village bank and intends to take out more loans so she can achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron bars, doors, and sheet metal to continue the construction on her house.

loans.name: Leonor De Jesus

texts.es: Leonor de 38 años de edad vive en asa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tienen 14 años de dedicarse a esa actividad, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y asi poder continuar con sus siembras y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Leonor, 38, lives in her own house with her husband and for 14 years has been growing corn and beans.  She sells her produce at the different markets near her home.  The loan she is requesting is to buy fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, herbicides, etc. to improve the land seen in the picture.  This will allow her to continue with her crop activity and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, herbicides, etc. to improve her land.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de animales menores, la socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua criando a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes, la socia cría a pollos y cuyes, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the communal bank "SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE" and she continues in her business of buying and selling small animals.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.  

She still raises and sells chickens and guinea pigs to her customers and wants to continue her work to support her family.

The loan she is requesting is to buy guinea pigs.

loans.use: To buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Zurite, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Jesusa; La socia continua dedicándose  a la ganadería y agricultura, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a sus negocios los cuales le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a cada uno de ellos, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas entre otros.
texts.en:
Jesusa is a member of the communal bank "San Martin de Zurite", which is located in the district of Zurite, belonging to the Anta province and Cusco department. 

She continues to make a living raising livestock and working in agriculture. Jesusa is thankful for the loan and commits herself to keeping her scheduled payments up.  She has been in business for quite some time and it is going well thanks to the hard work she puts in to support her family.

She is asking for the loan to buy fertilizer and seeds, among other things.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds, as well as other items.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.pt:
O senhor Fernando de 59 anos de idade,  pensionista cria e vende frangos,casado pai de 6 filhos dos quais 1 já é maior de idade e independente vive com os 5 dos quais 2 frequentam o ensino secundário e 3 o ensino primário na casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, ração, vitaminas, pintos, vacinas para criar e depois revender os frangos.
O cliente tem como sonho, ampliar o seu negocio para responder as necessidades dos seus clientes, melhorar as condições da sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família e abrir uma empresa pecuária.
Tem como desafios os financeiros e tem estado a trabalhar para poder suprílo-los, pretende tomar mais vezes o crédito para atingir seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Fernando, 59 years old, is retired and raises chickens to sell. He is married and the father of six children, one of whom is adult and lives on his own. The other five live with him in a home he owns. Two attend high school and three attend elementary school.
He will use the loan amount to buy feed, vitamins, chicks, and vaccines so he can raise and then resell the chickens.
His dream is to expand his business to meet his customers' needs, to improve his home so he can offer his family better living conditions, and to start a livestock business.
His major challenges are financial in nature, and he has been working to overcome them. He intends to take out additional loans so he can achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, chicks, and vaccines to raise and then resell chickens.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Don Víctor de 62 años de edad vive junto a sus cuatro hijos en casa propia. Él se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de frijol y maíz, ya tiene mas de 20 años de experiencia en el rubro, que le permite mantener la calidad de su labor y además obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia sus productos agrícolas en todas las zonas aledañas y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad, el es un hombre emprendedor dispuesto a salir adelante, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero no posee de suficiente capital para la compra de insumos  insecticida, abono, controles de plagas y algunas herramientas de trabajo etc.  por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar dichos productos, Don Víctor es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Victor, 62, lives with his four children in his own house.  He works in agriculture and specifically grows beans and corn.  He has over 20 years' experience in the sector which allows him to maintain a certain quality in his work and reap the best harvests.  He sells his produce all over the neighboring villages and has many customers as people know that everything he sells is top quality.

He is an enterprising man who aims to get ahead.  He wants to increase production this season but does not have enough capital to buy supplies such as insecticide, fertilizer, pest control agents and work tools.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy these items.

Victor is very responsible and has a good credit record.  He promises to pay back the loan while giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy insecticide, fertilizer, pest control agents, and work tools.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Zurite, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia María Elena sigue dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de leche, la socia continua vendiendo su mercadería a sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades, familiares entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca entre otros.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the San Martin de Zurite communal bank. The bank is located in the Zurite district, which is in the Anta province and the department of Cusco. 

Maria Elena continues in her business of purchasing and selling milk to customers such as friends, relatives and others.  She is a responsible, industrious person who wishes to continue her work to support her family.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a cow and other items.

loans.use: To buy a cow and other items.

loans.name: Pati Ibed

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Zurite, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Pati Ibed  sigue  dedicándose  a la ganadería, la socia se siente agradecida con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose a la compra y venta de maíz, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca entre otros.
texts.en:
This partner belongs to the communal bank San Martin de Zurite, situated in the Zurite district, which is in the Anta province of the Cusco department.

Pati Ibed continues to farm livestock; she is grateful for the loan she has received and is committed to meeting the repayment schedule. At the same time, she continues to buy and sell corn. She wishes to continue working so that she can keep supporting her family.

Pati Ibed is requesting a loan to buy a cow, among other things.

loans.use: to buy a cow, among other things.

loans.name: Humberto  Vidal

texts.es: Humberto de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, Él se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de granos básicos, frijol y maíz,  tiene más de 14 años de dedicarse a esa actividad y gracias a eso es que le permite mantener la calidad de sus cosechas, comercializa sus productos en todas los pueblos aledaños y tiene mucha clientela por los precios accesibles, Humberto es hombre muy trabajador y responsable, el quiere aumentar la producción de sus cosechas pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso solicita un credito que le permita comprar insecticida, abono, fertilizantes, etc. y de esta manera poder salir adelante y poder  darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Humberto, aged 32, lives in his own home with his spouse. 

He makes a living farming cereals, beans and corn, which he has been doing for over 14 years, meaning he is able to maintain the quality of his harvests. He sells his products in all of the neighboring villages, and has many customers thanks to his attainable prices. 

Humberto is very hard working and responsible. He wishes to increase the productivity of his harvests but he does not have enough capital to do so, which is why he is requesting a loan allowing him to buy insecticide, compost, fertilizers etc. This way he will be able to get ahead and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy insecticide, compost, fertilizer etc.

loans.name: Ada

texts.es:
La Sra. Ada trabaja en un ministerio,  y por la noche estudia,  gracias a su trabajo ella puede estudiar.
Es una persona muy responsable y dedicada a sus estudios y a su familia, aspira a ser una buena profesional y seguir estudiando y servir a las personas. Está estudiando la licenciatura en análisis clínicos.
Pide este préstamo para pagar las cuotas de su carrera.
texts.en:
Ada works in a ministry and studies at night. She is able to study thanks to her job. She is a very responsible person, dedicated to her studies and to her family. She aspires to be a good professional, continue studying and serve people. She is studying for a degree in clinical analysis.

She is asking for this loan to pay her university fees.

loans.use: to pay her university fees

loans.name: Kim

texts.en:
Kim and her husband (both are in the picture, standing in front of their house) are farmers with five children in Srey Rousey Village. Among five of Kim's children, three of them work in Phnom Penh as wage workers and send back some money for support their family each month. Kim and her husband still work on their farm in order not to make themselves lazy. Besides earning by farming, Kim's husband works as a village chief.

Living in an off-power grid area, Kim and husband need to use a car battery for daily usage; however, a car battery is a time and money consuming power source. Kim's husband has to travel a long distance to charge the battery. They always want an easy using power source and to save money. Seeing their parents' difficulty and wish, Kim's children recommend their parents buy a solar home system because it is clean and can save utility fees. As a result, Kim and her husband decided to apply for a KIVA loan to buy a solar home system. With a solar home system, they can save utility fees and reduce time spent on the car battery. They can live in comfortable condition.

loans.use: to pay for solar home system

location.town: Sre Rousey Village, Chhean Loeng Commune, Samaki M

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her farming activity through the application of modern farming technologies for more income so as to improve family living standards.

loans.name: Yenny Marcela

texts.es:
Yenny, de 31 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella se desempeña como confeccionista de distintas prendas en contratación con terceros tales como pijamas, camisetas y ropa interior.

Esta actividad la inicio con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus estudios.

Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada, siempre en busca de oportunidades para progresar y mejorar como empresaria.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar una maquina de confección que le permita mejorar su nivel de producción y poder aumentar sus ventas.

De esta forma podría solventar todos sus gastos y podría tener esa vida plena que tanto ha soñado.
texts.en: Yenny, 31 years old, is very sure of what she wants for her life, and has decided to move ahead and have a good life. She works as a seamstress making different clothes, such as pajamas, t-shirts and underwear from contracts with third parties. She started this job motivated to look for the necessary resources to support her studies. She is an enterprising and very disciplined woman, always looking for opportunities to progress and to improve as a businesswoman. She is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine that will allow her to improve her level production and increase her sales. This way, she will be able to pay for her expenses and have the full life she has always dreamed of.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine that will allow her to improve her production level and increase her sales.

loans.name: Bridaine

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HUAYNA CCAPAC  ,la socia sigue  dedicándose al negocio de venta de repuestos de carros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de parabrisas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank HUAYNA CCAPAC and continues to earn a living selling car parts. The member has been earning a living through this business for some time and the business is doing well, thanks to the effort she puts in everyday. The member wants to be able to continue working, so that she can continue to support her family in this way.

The member is requesting a loan to buy windshields amongst other things. The member is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy windshields amongst other things

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth desde muy temprana edad aprendió el oficio de confección de ropa a través de clases y fue así como poco a poco Elizabeth empezó a entender y aplicar estos conocimientos.

Tiene tres hijos que son su más grande adoración.
Es una mujer emprendedora, amorosa y siempre dispuesta a atender a sus clientes de la mejor manera.

Se siente muy agradecida con todo lo que ha podido construir hasta ahora con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar.

Madruga todos los días para trabajar en sus negocio durante 10 horas.
Ella pide un apoyo económico para comprar insumos de confección como tela, hilos y agujas; además desea realizar la compra de una maquina recubridora.

Tiene muchas esperanzas en su negocio y conserva la ilusión de tener un taller mucho más grande en el que pueda ofrecer empleo y aumentar sus clientes.
texts.en: Since an early age, Elizabeth learned to sew clothes through lessons, and it was like this that Elizabeth started to understand and apply this knowledge. She has three children, who are her greatest love. She is an enterprising woman, loving and ready to help her customers in the best way. She feels very grateful for everything she has been able to do until now with help of Corporación Interactuar. She gets up very early every day to work in her business for 10 hours. She is requesting financial support to buy sewing inputs such as fabric, threads, needles. Also, she needs to buy a covering sewing machine. She has great hopes in her business, and she looks forward to a bigger workshop where she can offer employment and have more customers.

loans.use: to buy sewing inputs such as fabric, threads and needles. Also, she wants to buy a covering sewing machine.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.es:
La socia Aurea pertenece al banco comunal HUAYNA CCAPAC   ,la socia continua  dedicándose al negocio de venta de autopartes para carros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de faros entre otros.
texts.en:
The member, Aurea, belongs to the communal bank HUAYNA CCAPAC. She continues to make a living by selling auto parts. She has been making a living with her business for quite some time. It is doing well for her because of the effort she puts into it everyday.

She wants to continue working to be able to support her family.

She is requesting this credit to buy headlamps and so on.

loans.use: to buy auto parts, such as headlamps.
